title: Supplementary Education centres in Tamil Nadu
summary: Tuition and learning centers around Thiruchendur supporting children from Dalit villages; also supported women’s micro-credit and CBR.

title: Tribal School & Community Development in Wayanad
summary: Support for a residential school serving tribal villages via infrastructure, mentoring, relief work, and project management with local partners.

title: Reforestation efforts in Bandipur
summary: Clearing invasive Lantana and restoring native vegetation with Junglescapes; employment for tribal colonies and environmental benefits.

title: Enhanced Learning Environment (ELE) — Pilot
summary: Mentoring teachers, curating content, and improving learning outcomes; scaling online support to new regions and countries.
